document_data.name: Yi Woo
document_data.mainbody: '''Yi Woo''' was a [[Shou]] healer who operated [[Yi Wu's Clinic|a clinic]] in the [[Xiousing]] district of [[Marsember]]. In his youth, he studied the [[arcane magic|arcane]] as well as the martial arts. Later in life he moved to Xiousing and opened a healing clinic that served both Shou and native Marsembens. He would heal anyone regardless of their ability to pay. Woo became frustrated with the [[Purple Dragons]]' inability to fight crime so he became a secret vigilante, operating under the cover of darkness.{{Cite dungeon/195/Backdrop: Xiousing}}
